item.title: TextBar - Mac App
item.description:
TextBar is a tiny but powerful app that lets you add any text to your MenuBar.
Major new version available - v3. No upgrade fee. Want to monitor TextBar from multiple machines on the web - see TextBar Live. Overview: Download app || Purchase “TextBar is an awesome app which solves a problem that I have been struggling with for at least three years” - MacStories.
